title: T202 Ty Cobb & Joe Jackson Center Panel Lot (3) SOLD
author: D. Bergin

posts.post_title: T202 Ty Cobb & Joe Jackson Center Panel Lot (3) SOLD
posts.post_content:
T202 Hassan Lot of (3) Center Panels

Includes:

#1. "Lord Catches His Man" with the much debated sliding Joe Jackson - Is it really him? I'm just the messenger, man! ;)

#2. Ty Cobb Steals Third - The iconic shot of Cobb blowing up the 3rd base bag.

#3. "A Desperate Slide For Third" - Identified as Cobb sliding into Jimmy Austin of the Browns. What may be the neatest thing about this card, is that there's actually a reference to Joe Jackson on the back, and Cobb himself teaching him how to slide.

Condition as shown in the scans. If you need bigger scans, let me know and I'll e-mail them to you. The Lord/Jackson is the nicest one. The iconic Cobb is the roughest. Presentable on the front, pretty bad on the back.

SOLD (Shipped in the U.S.) for the set of (3) 

Pay almost any way you like.

PM to reserve or e-mail me at David at Boxingtreasures dot com

Thanks.

Wow, that was quick!  :eek:

I'll PM you shortly.
